00024         def update(self,current_value):
00025                 """
00026                 Calculate PID output value for given reference input and feedback
00027                 """
00028                 self.error=[]
00029                 self.error.append(self.set_point.position.x - current_value.position.x)
00030                 self.error.append(self.set_point.position.y - current_value.position.y)
00031                 self.error.append(self.set_point.position.z - current_value.position.z)
00032                 #print self.error
00033                 PID=[]
00034                 for i in range(3):
00035                         #print type(self.Kp)
00036                         #print type(self.error)
00037 
00038                         self.P_value = self.Kp[i] * float(self.error[i])
00039                         #print type(self.Derivator)
00040                         #print 'error',self.Derivator[i]
00041                         self.D_value = self.Kd[i] * (self.error[i] - self.Derivator[i])
00042                         self.Derivator[i] = self.error[i]
00043                         '''
00044                         self.Integrator = self.Integrator + dt * self.error
00045 
00046                         if self.Integrator > self.Integrator_max:
00047                                 self.Integrator = self.Integrator_max
00048                         elif self.Integrator < self.Integrator_min:
00049                                 self.Integrator = self.Integrator_min
00050 
00051                         self.I_value = self.Integrator * self.Ki[i]
00052                         '''
00053                         #PID = self.P_value + self.I_value + self.D_value
00054                         PID.append(self.P_value + self.D_value)
00055                 return PID
00056                 '''
00057                 self.error = self.set_point - current_value
00058 
00059                 self.P_value = self.Kp * self.error
00060                 self.D_value = self.Kd * ( self.error - self.Derivator)
00061                 self.Derivator = self.error
00062 
00063                 self.Integrator = self.Integrator + dt * self.error
00064 
00065                 if self.Integrator > self.Integrator_max:
00066                         self.Integrator = self.Integrator_max
00067                 elif self.Integrator < self.Integrator_min:
00068                         self.Integrator = self.Integrator_min
00069
